title: In case of land which were / are partly encumbered and where encumbrance are / were rеmoved and / or rehabilitated elsewhere by the project implementing authority, the entitlement for TDR / DR for the portion of land which is / was vacant shall be as per Sr
clause_text: In case of land which were / are partly encumbered and where encumbrance are / were rеmoved and / or rehabilitated elsewhere by the project implementing authority, the entitlement for TDR / DR for the portion of land which is / was vacant shall be as per Sr.No.(a) of Regulation 11.2.4 and the entitlement of TDR / DRC for the portion of land which is / was encumbered shall be equivalent to the area of encumbered land taken over for public project.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
